analysis: The project is a static website focused on black holes with interactive elements. The current theme needs enhancement to better reflect the cosmic and mysterious nature of black holes. The existing files include HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for animations and interactions. The theme should incorporate dark, cosmic visuals with animations that represent black holes, swirling effects, and glowing elements.

improvements.description: Enhance the CSS file to include a dark cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Add gradients and animations to represent the gravitational pull and event horizon of black holes.

Update the HTML to include more interactive elements related to black holes, such as animated slides that depict the formation and behavior of black holes, and sections that explain the science behind them.

Improve the JavaScript to include more dynamic animations and interactions, such as simulating the gravitational pull of black holes on nearby objects and adding interactive elements that respond to user actions.
